price: Унда абадий қоладилар. Қиёмат куни уларнинг юки нақадар ёмон юк бўлди.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ حِمۡلٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhi wasāa lahum yawma al-qiyāmati ḥim'lan
